last_episode_to_air.name: Woman of the hour
last_episode_to_air.overview: At the Minx International launch party, Doug confronts Constance, while Joyce starts to lose control of her magazine. Shelly and Lenny look towards an uncertain future.

name: Minx
overview: An earnest young feminist joins forces with a low-rent publisher to make the world's first erotic magazine for women.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Doug and Joyce grapple with Minx’s explosive success, which brings more money, fame and temptation than either of them knows how to handle.

episodes.name: Not like a shvantz right in the face
episodes.overview: After a fateful meeting with low-rent publisher Doug Renetti, self-proclaimed feminist Joyce Prigger finally gets a shot at creating the magazine of her dreams – with one enormous catch.

episodes.name: Au revoir, le double dong
episodes.overview: Doug courts his usual advertisers, while Joyce looks for more conventional companies to do business with. Bambi looks to channel her newfound feminism into a new role.

episodes.name: Norman Mailer, Samantha Shortcake
episodes.overview: The arrival of a new local politician disrupts Bottom Dollar’s status quo. Then, when her contributors pull out at the last minute, Joyce scrambles to fill Minx with articles that live up to her ludicrously high standards.

episodes.name: An exciting new chapter in the annals of erotica
episodes.overview: While David and Tina deal with Bottom Dollar’s financial woes, Joyce helps a sexy coverboy prep for Minx’s first presser.

episodes.name: Relaying news of a wayward snake
episodes.overview: While Doug and Joyce work to placate the Mob, the Minx team scrambles to live up to their leader’s overly ambitious vision.

episodes.name: Mary had a little hysterectomy
episodes.overview: To help bolster Minx’s sales, Bambi and Shelly spread the word to local housewives, while Joyce and Glenn are accidental sources of chaos on a local campus.

episodes.name: God save the Queen of Dicks
episodes.overview: While Doug celebrates Minx’s success, Joyce laments her newfound celebrity status. Councilwoman Westbury doubles down on her efforts to bring down Bottom Dollar, and Richie reluctantly enters the LA art scene.

episodes.name: Oh, you’re the sun now? Giver of life?
episodes.overview: Joyce enjoys the spotlight as a guest on an iconic TV talk show while fighting against memories of her time in New York. Doug makes moves for Minx. Back home, Bambi and Richie discover Tina’s secret.

episodes.name: A scintillating conversation about a lethal pesticide
episodes.overview: While Joyce takes it easy in New York, things back at Bottom Dollar only get harder for Doug, whose vision for Minx clashes with everything Joyce’s magazine stood for. Bambi helps Shelly get in touch with her sexuality.

episodes.name: You happened to me
episodes.overview: With all of the Valley seemingly pitted against Bottom Dollar, Doug flounders, while Joyce takes a stand. A men’s rights protest threatens the future of Minx.

episodes.name: The perils of being a wealthy widow
episodes.overview: One year into launching Minx Magazine, Joyce struggles to pick a new publisher she can trust. Drowning in debt, Doug scrambles to keep his company afloat. Shelly goes back to the ’burbs to focus on her family.

episodes.name: I thought the bed was gonna fly
episodes.overview: Bottom Dollar hosts the west coast premiere of the controversial and illegal adult film, “Deep Throat.” Doug tries to dazzle their new publisher while Joyce sets out to get a famed writer to contribute a piece for Minx.

episodes.name: It's okay to like it
episodes.overview: Six months later, Minx is front and center of the sexual revolution. Rolling Stone descends on the Bottom Dollar offices to interview the gang.

episodes.name: Life, Liberty and the Pursuit of Sexiness
episodes.overview: Joyce takes her eyes off the ball(s) and ditches work for her new rock star beau.

episodes.name: A stately pleasure dome decree
episodes.overview: Joyce and Doug head to Vegas to sell the international rights to Minx. At Bottom Dollar, Tina aims to let loose and host a watch party for the Billie Jean King vs. Bobby Riggs tennis match.

episodes.name: This is our zig
episodes.overview: Shelly gets a taste of college life while joining Joyce on her victory-lap trip to Vassar. Doug accompanies Tina to her mom’s retirement party and learns some surprising news. Bambi connects with Richie on a trip of their own.

episodes.name: God closes a door, opens a glory hole
episodes.overview: Constance, Joyce, and Tina head to a wilderness retreat to pick Minx International publishers. Back at Bottom Dollar, Richie has to replace a centerfold and scrambles to redo the new issue.

episodes.name: Woman of the hour
episodes.overview: At the Minx International launch party, Doug confronts Constance, while Joyce starts to lose control of her magazine. Shelly and Lenny look towards an uncertain future.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Doug and Joyce grapple with Minx’s explosive success, which brings more money, fame and temptation than either of them knows how to handle.
